products.title: Foldsack Backpack
products.description: Perfect everyday backpack with padded laptop sleeve. Ideal for daily use and outdoor walks.

products.description: Slim-fit, breathable, and durable casual T-shirt. Features contrast raglan sleeves and a three-button placket.

products.title: Cotton Jacket
products.description: Versatile jacket suitable for various outdoor activities. Great for hiking, camping, and traveling.

products.description: Slim-fit casual shirt with a modern design. Note that colors may vary slightly from the image.

products.title: Dragon Chain Bracelet
products.description: Inspired by the mythical water dragon, this bracelet symbolizes love and protection. Perfect for special occasions.

products.title: Gold Micropave Bracelet
products.description: Elegant and delicate gold bracelet. Satisfaction guaranteed with a 30-day return policy.

products.title: Princess Ring
products.description: Classic solitaire diamond promise ring. Ideal for engagements, weddings, and anniversaries.

products.title: Tunnel Plug Earrings
products.description: Rose gold plated double flared tunnel plug earrings. Made of durable 316L stainless steel.

products.title: 2TB External Drive
products.description: High-capacity portable hard drive with fast data transfer. Compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0.

products.title: 1TB Internal SSD
products.description: Boost your PC's performance with this internal SSD. Offers fast boot-up and application load times.

products.title: 256GB SSD
products.description: High-performance SSD with 3D NAND flash. Enhances system performance and reliability.

products.title: PS4 Gaming Drive
products.description: Expand your PS4 gaming experience with this high-capacity drive. Sleek design with fast setup.

products.title: 21.5" Full HD Monitor
products.description: Ultra-thin Full HD monitor with IPS display. Features Radeon FreeSync technology for smooth visuals.

products.title: Curved Gaming Monitor
products.description: Super ultrawide curved gaming monitor with QLED technology. High refresh rate for smooth gameplay.

products.title: 3-in-1 Winter Jacket
products.description: Versatile 3-in-1 snowboard jacket with detachable liner. Suitable for various weather conditions.

products.title: Faux Leather Jacket
products.description: Stylish faux leather biker jacket with removable hood. Features zippered pockets and a modern design.

products.title: Striped Raincoat
products.description: Lightweight raincoat with adjustable hood and drawstring waist. Perfect for outdoor activities.

products.title: Boat Neck Top
products.description: Lightweight and stretchy boat neck top. Features ribbed sleeves and double stitching for durability.

products.description: Breathable and moisture-wicking short sleeve top. Soft fabric with a comfortable V-neck design.
